title: Strongly Enhanced persulfate activation by bicarbonate accelerated Cu (III)/Cu (I) redox cycle
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00172A, Paper
Jun Zhang, Shenjun Wang, Yuhao Wu, Jiahai Ma
In the advanced oxidation system, the promoting effect of bicarbonate is relatively overlooked. Bicarbonate, as an inorganic anion widely present in natural waters, is extremely important for water treatment. Therefore,...
